title: HTML Course
overview: Learn HTML basics: structure, headings, paragraphs, links, images, lists, forms.

lessons.title: What is HTML?
lessons.content:
What is HTML?

HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the language used to structure web pages. It uses tags like <h1>, <p>, and <a>.

lessons.title: Links & Images
lessons.content:
Links & Images

Use <a href="..."> for links and <img src="..." alt="..." /> for images.

lessons.title: Forms
lessons.content:
Forms

Collect input with <form>, <input>, and <button>. Use method and action to submit.
